channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Advanced WP Columns
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Advanced WP Columns

item.title: CVE-2022-3426|2024-08-03T01:07:06.546Z -- unknown -- advanced%20wp%20columns
item.description: The Advanced WP Columns WordPress plugin through 2.0.6 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
